text: LVM can stand for: * Las Vegas Monorail, a rail transport system in Las Vegas * Latent variable model, a statistical model * Legio V Macedonica, a Roman legion * Logical volume management, a method of transparently storing computer data spread over several partitions * Logical Volume Manager, an implementation of logical volume management in the Linux kernel * Ludwig von Mises Institute, a libertarian academic organisation * Ministry of Transport and Communications' acronym in Finnish, Liikenne- ja viestintäministeriö.
title: LVM
